foreignData.name: Sandsteinorakel
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Wenn das Sandsteinorakel ins Spiel kommt, bestimme einen Gegner. Falls jener Spieler mehr Karten auf der Hand hat als du, ziehe so viele Karten, wie die Differenz beträgt.

foreignData.name: Oráculo de arenisca
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
Cuando el Oráculo de arenisca entre al campo de batalla, elige un oponente. Si ese jugador tiene más cartas en la mano que tú, roba una cantidad de cartas igual a la diferencia.

foreignData.name: Oracle de grès
foreignData.text:
Vol
Quand l'Oracle de grès arrive sur le champ de bataille, choisissez un adversaire. Si ce joueur a plus de cartes en main que vous, piochez un nombre de cartes égal à la différence.

foreignData.name: Oracolo di Arenaria
foreignData.text:
Volare
Quando l'Oracolo di Arenaria entra nel campo di battaglia, scegli un avversario. Se quel giocatore ha più carte in mano di te, pesca un numero di carte pari alla differenza.

foreignData.name: 砂岩の予言者
foreignData.text:
飛行
砂岩の予言者が戦場に出たとき、対戦相手１人を選ぶ。そのプレイヤーの手札にあるカードがあなたのそれより多いなら、その差に等しい枚数のカードを引く。
foreignData.type: アーティファクト・クリーチャー — スフィンクス

foreignData.name: Oráculo de Arenito
foreignData.text:
Voar
Quando Oráculo de Arenito entrar no campo de batalha, escolha um oponente. Se aquele jogador tiver mais cards na mão do que você, compre um número de cards igual à diferença.

foreignData.name: Оракул Песчаника
foreignData.text:
Полет
Когда Оракул Песчаника выходит на поле битвы, выберите оппонента. Если у того игрока в руке больше карт, чем у вас, возьмите количество карт, равное разнице значений.

foreignData.name: 砂岩先知
foreignData.text:
飞行
当砂岩先知进战场时，选择一位对手。若该牌手的手牌数量比你多，则抓等同于该差距数量的牌。

name: Sandstone Oracle
originalText:
Flying
When Sandstone Oracle enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. If that player has more cards in hand than you, draw cards equal to the difference.

rulings.text: You choose an opponent while Sandstone Oracle's ability is resolving. No player may take actions between the time you make this choice and the time you draw cards.

To draw cards equal to the difference, first determine how many cards you'll draw, then draw that many cards, as modified by replacement effects. For example, if you have two cards in hand and the chosen opponent has five, Thought Reflection will cause you to draw six cards instead of three.
